title: Level 1 Case 1 - Unbreak My Heart
material: Site breaking-cnn.com tries to mimic CNN; it is known to publish celebrity death hoaxes. The easiest way to see whether a news is fake or not is to look at the link and check whether it is suspicious.
comment: Oops, thatâ€™s not what we are looking for...
response: Hey, I found out that this post is actually a fake! :(
